reviewText: This is remarkably dull: Lots of talk, very little action, and no gore. It's also very badly dubbed even by Italian horror movie standards. The Substance DVD is letterboxed, but taken from a scruffy VHS tape, so there's a lot of popping and crackling on the soundtrack, and even occasional rolling of the image.
I haven't actaly watched that movie yet,but plan to soon. but it sounds vary scary so there isn't much I can say about it at this time.
